page.title: 11FARMERS WIFE
page.content: After lunch, this {West Torrington farmer's wife may have time for wine-making, baking, or gardening, if the weather is suitable. The primary-school aged child is picked up from the school bus at 3.30pm, the other children are collected from the secondary-school bus at 4.20pm. Dinner is eaten at about 5pm, then the children may need ferrying to and from piano lessons, gymnastics or other clubs, which may be in Market Rasen, eight miles away. The farmer's wife may also go out to meetings or clubs, such as Parent- Teacher Associations, badminton, Farm Women's Group or other occasional meetings which may be arranged in surrounding villages. She will hope to get to bed shortly after 10pm.
